title: LoL Launcher Progamme irresponsive
body: Hey I've just very recently been experiencing a problem with the LoL launcher itself since this morning just after the mainteince every time i go to start the programme it closes and doesnt even go to the launch part at all. please help ive already uninstalled and reinstalled but to see the same problem (i just got into my ranked games aswell :( ) its as if there is a glitch with the actual progamme itself.

replies.body: How did you solve this exactly? What did you do?

A Friend helped me he said the problem is with the kernel launcher he has had it happen to him a few times aswell it has fixed the problem but still this is very time consuming for such a problem... happy but unhappy
